name: the three bears beanie
notes:
the minnesota yarn shop hop 2024 was fairytales and knitting from the heart chose goldilocks and the three bears.  

this pattern includes instructions to make hats for momma, papa and baby bear.  one skein of dream in color classy will make either a mamma or a papa or two baby bears.

mama and papa bear fits head sizes 19”-23” 
baby bear fits newborn-6 months, approx. 13”-16”

if you are a loose knitter we suggest going down to a us 6 needle.

option to add beads to the slipped stitches.  prestring 70-100 size six beads and add them every other slipped stitch every third round.

preorder our colors by dream in color, just right (white with speckles), or bears in the forest (browns) here until april 28, 2024:  www.heartknits.com

thank you so much for joining us this year!
